name: Northern Exposure: Jasper Rock Climbing
description: Get rocked in the heart of the Rockies. Northern Exposure is the first guidebook to cover all the rock climbs in Jasper National Park. Discover 550 sport, gear, and semi-alpine routes, plus 70 bouldering problems, with detailed descriptions and full-colour photos. Also includes information on gear selection, weather, and the history of climbing in the area.
